name: The Diving Turtle In The Deep Blue Sea FREE
name_original: The Diving Turtle In The Deep Blue Sea FREE
description:
You guide The Diving Turtle in the deep blue sea back and forth. You have to avoid any collision with the jelly fish and the obstacles along the way. Tap to stay diving and collect as many pearls as you can.

Features
-Nice 2D graphics and sounds
-Progressively harder gameplay
-Save and load high score
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
